title: White Sands National Monument: Parks as Classrooms
body: Parks as Classrooms        Curriculum Materials Check out our ready-made lesson plans! Topics range from plant adaptation to fun craft projects that teach students about the park. All Curriculum Materials     Field Trips Make White Sands National Monument your next educational field trip! Arrange for a ranger to give your class presentations on a variety of topics, including geology and wildlife.  All Field Trips     Guest Speakers Invite a Ranger to Your Classroom! Would you like a ranger to come to your classroom? Contact us to arrange for an in-class presentation on a topic relevant to the unit you are teaching. All Guest Speakers     Materials to Loan We also have Teacher Bags! These bags contain everything needed to teach your students about White Sands National Monument. All Materials to Loan     Traveling Trunks Reserve a Teacher Trunk! When a field trip to the dunes is not an option, think about reserving one of our Teacher Resource Trunks. Each trunk contains everything you need to teach the section.  All Traveling Trunks
